title: What is the relevance to contemporary times of the First Voyage around the world? - Quora

response.answer_text: Magellan’s first circumnavigation was quite a heroic exploit. It took him very nearly three years to complete, from 1519 to 1522. The ISS circles the globe every 91 minutes. That is a factor of about 17,000 times faster. Most other aspects of human existence have improved by a similar factor in the intervening 500 years. Timeline of the Magellan–Elcano circumnavigation - WikipediaHow Long Does It Take for the International Space Station to Orbit Earth?
